document.full_text: japan's current account surplus fell less than expected in april from a year earlier, fuelling further hopes for an early economic recovery as manufacturers restore lost production and mend supply chains after the march disaster.
document.title: japan current account surplus slumps, recovery seen
lines_and_colors: japan's current account surplus fell less than expected in april from a year earlier, fuelling further hopes for an early economic recovery as manufacturers restore lost production and mend supply chains after the march disaster.
